description: Average True Range proxy over 5 days
notes: ATR = Average True Range. In this pipeline it is a simplified ATR proxy: rolling mean of (High - Low), then shifted by 1 day.
Built from historical prices/volume and shifted with shift(1), so value at t uses information available at t-1.
